title: Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024), in so far as it is not already in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Employment Permits Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Employment Permits Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited employment permit act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024), in so far as it is not already in
heading: 2. The 19th day of February 2025 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 19th day of February 2025 is appointed as the day on which the 
Employment Permits Act 2024 (No. 17 of 2024), in so far as it is not already in 
operation, shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 February, 2025. 

PETER BURKE, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st February, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [32] 3
